original_title: Excuse Me, I'm Looking for the Ping-pong Room and My Girlfriend
overview: A film about a couple on a wellness trip, where one partner disappears and the other isn't sure whether he's looking for her or himself. Within the bizarre world of the alpine wellness resort, Aron begins a new chapter in his life.
title: Excuse Me, I'm Looking for the Ping-pong Room and My Girlfriend
